archimate:Requirement.name: BA.2.3.6c: c) assigning privileges to restrict the functions authorised individuals can perform in databases (e.g. defining user profiles and user access privileges for individuals who need to open, read and modify the contents of databases)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
